question: please tell me which duas to recite for good memory as I am preparing for very big exam
answer:
QUESTION

please tell me which duas to recite for good memory as I am preparing for very big exam due in April.I feel like I am forgetting whatever I read.Also guide me how to keep my Imaan safe and strong

ANSWER


Share:

Recite ‘Rabb inniy maghloobun, fantasir’ as much as possible.

Also, work hard and prepare properly. Read your five daily Salaats and make du’aa after every Fardh Salaat.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
